[Loupe](http://latentflip.com/loupe/?!!!PGJ1dHRvbj5DbGljayBtZSE8L2J1dHRvbj4%3D ) is a decent tool for event-driven programming. It visualizes the event loop in JS. For people who wonder how JS callback queue and event loop interact, it might be a quick reference.

***

* Event is a core concept (or mechanism, more seriously) for JS. Thus it's really critical to understand it deeply
* Loupe provides a visualization to it
* Useful for training newbies like interns
